column5: Anyone who owns 75 90 115 2008 or newer  mercury four stroke check your air filter. My was breaking down and was getting sucked into the air intake.Warranty is up on my motor so I took the hit for a new filter ($101.00)Seem they have not changed anything so I will Keep a close eye on this one.
Thanks for the heads up Steve. Mine is a little older. A  06, 75 horse model and I'll be sure to check it before it goes out again.
Thanks Steve--I've got a 50 but I'd thought I'd stop and congratulate you on being a tiller operator (Avatar)  The Mark of a True angler
20 ft Lund with a 90hp tiller I love it.
